data.MySQLDAO

Class UtilityDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.MySQLDAO.UtilityDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO

    public class UtilityDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAO
    Utility class for the data layer, the purpose of this class is diminish couplings between daos. Whenever a DAO must use another DAO it should go through this class
